net.jxta.impl.cm
Class XIndiceAdvertisementCache

java.lang.Object
  net.jxta.impl.cm.AbstractAdvertisementCache
      net.jxta.impl.cm.XIndiceAdvertisementCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvertisementCache
public class XIndiceAdvertisementCache
extends AbstractAdvertisementCache
implements AdvertisementCache

This is the original Cm implementation.

areaName - the name of the cm sub-dir to create

NOTE: Default garbage interval once an hour

XIndiceAdvertisementCache

public XIndiceAdvertisementCache(URI storeRoot,
                                 String areaName,
                                 long gcInterval,
                                 boolean trackDeltas)
                          throws IOException
Constructor for cm

Parameters:
storeRoot - persistence location
areaName - storage area name
gcInterval - garbage collect max interval in milliseconds or <= 0 to use default value.
trackDeltas - when true deltas are tracked
Throws:
IOException - thrown for failures initilzing the CM store.

getExpirationtime

public long getExpirationtime(String dn,
                              String fn)
Returns the maximum duration in milliseconds for which this document should cached by those other than the publisher. This value is either the cache lifetime or the remaining lifetime of the document, whichever is less.

Specified by:
getExpirationtime in interface AdvertisementCache
Parameters:
dn - contains the name of the folder
fn - contains the name of the file
Returns:
number of milliseconds until the file expires or -1 if the file is not recognized or already expired.

setTrackDeltas

public void setTrackDeltas(boolean trackDeltas)
Description copied from interface: AdvertisementCache

Specified by:

trackDeltas - when true, changes will be tracked.
